document.full_text: the nato mission in libya is now a coalition of the willing, which analysts say undermines the cohesion of the alliance. it is even worse news for europe and its military ambitions.
document.title: letter from europe: libya crisis reveals splits on e.u. goals
lines_and_colors: the nato mission in libya is now a coalition of the willing, which analysts say undermines the cohesion of the alliance. it is even worse news for europe and its military ambitions.
